ATTRIBUTE_IN_CLOSING_TAG: La </[[closeTag.name]]> etiqueta de cerrado aquí no puede contener atributos.
CLOSE_TAG_FOR_VOID_ELEMENT: El cierre aquí es un elemento vacío (es decir, un elemento que no tiene por que ser cerrado).
CSS_MIXED_ACTIVECONTENT: The CSS property [[cssProperty.property]] has a url() value here that currently points to an insecure resource. You can make this error disappear by logging into Webmaker. For more information on how modern browsers signal insecure content, visit this link.
EVENT_HANDLER_ATTR_NOT_ALLOWED: Sorry, but security restrictions on this site prevent you from using the JavaScript event handler attribute here. If you really need to use JavaScript, consider using jsbin or jsfiddle.
HTML_CODE_IN_CSS_BLOCK: HTML code was detected in CSS context starting here
HTTP_LINK_FROM_HTTPS_PAGE: The <[[openTag.name]]> tag's [[attribute.name.value]] attribute (here) currently points to an insecure resource. You can make this error disappear by logging into Webmaker. For more information on how modern browsers signal insecure content, visit this link.
INVALID_ATTR_NAME: El atributo aquí tiene un nombre que no es permitido en el sistema de convenciones de nombres de HTML5.
UNSUPPORTED_ATTR_NAMESPACE: The attribute here uses an attribute namespace that is not permitted under HTML5 conventions.
MULTIPLE_ATTR_NAMESPACES: The attribute here has multiple namespaces. Check your text and make sure there's only a single namespace prefix for the attribute.
INVALID_CSS_PROPERTY_NAME: La propiedad CSS [[cssProperty.property]] no existe. Quizás desees ver una lista de propiedades CSS.
INVALID_CSS_RULE: This CSS rule is not legal CSS.
INVALID_TAG_NAME:
The < character here appears to be the beginning of a tag, but is not followed by a valid tag name.

If you just want a < to appear on your Web page, try using < instead.

Or, see a list of HTML5 tags.
JAVASCRIPT_URL_NOT_ALLOWED: Sorry, but security restrictions on this site prevent you from using the javascript: URL here. If you really need to use JavaScript, consider using jsbin or jsfiddle.
MISMATCHED_CLOSE_TAG: The closing </[[closeTag.name]]> tag here doesn't pair with the opening <[[openTag.name]]> tag here. This is likely due to a missing </[[openTag.name]]> tag.
MISSING_CSS_BLOCK_CLOSER: Missing bloque más cerca o al lado de propiedad: valor; par siguiente [[cssValue.value]] .
MISSING_CSS_SELECTOR: Missing either a new CSS selector or the </style> tag here.
MISSING_CSS_VALUE: Falta el valor para [[cssProperty.property]] .
SCRIPT_ELEMENT_NOT_ALLOWED: Lo sentimos, pero las restricciones de seguridad de este sitio le impiden usar
SELF_CLOSING_NON_VOID_ELEMENT: El <[[nombre]]> aquí no puede ser auto-cerrado, porque <[[nombre]]> no es un elemento vacío, sino que debe estar cerrada con un etiqueta.
UNCAUGHT_CSS_PARSE_ERROR: A parse error occurred outside expected cases: [[error.msg]]
UNEXPECTED_CLOSE_TAG: The closing </[[closeTag.name]]> tag here doesn't pair with anything, because there are no opening tags that need to be closed.
UNFINISHED_CSS_PROPERTY: Propiedad [[cssProperty.property]] que aún queda finalizar con:
UNKOWN_CSS_KEYWORD: The CSS @keyword [[cssKeyword.value]] does not match any known @keywords.
UNQUOTED_ATTR_VALUE: The Attribute value here should start with an opening double quote.
UNTERMINATED_ATTR_VALUE: The <[[openTag.name]]> tag's [[attribute.name.value]] attribute has a value here that doesn't end with a closing double quote.
UNTERMINATED_CLOSE_TAG: The closing </[[closeTag.name]]> tag here doesn't end with a >.
UNTERMINATED_COMMENT: El comentario aquí no finaliza con un -->.
UNTERMINATED_CSS_COMMENT: El comentario CSS aquí no termina con */.
UNTERMINATED_OPEN_TAG: La <[[openTag.name]]> etiqueta de apertura aquí no finaliza con un >.
